metadata.title: PM congratulates Mark Carney on becoming PM of Canada

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 14 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Friday congratulated Mark Carney on being sworn in as the Prime Minister of Canada. In a post on X, he said, "I congratulate Mr. Mark Carney on being sworn in as the Prime Minister of Canada. Wish him a successful tenure in office and look forward to working with him to further strengthen Pakistan-Canada relations in all spheres."
